description: Towering in at 6'2' of muscle with shoulders that literally fill the door frame, Magnus is quite possibly Brazil's finest export since the coffee bean.  This is a man where EVERYTHING is oversized and in proportion. He also once and for all smashed the myth that all men who build their bodies are compensating for being short changed in the meat department. Magus isn't just built, he's built like a Greek statute and impossibly ripped right down to stadium sized thighs and merely six pack abs, but an deeply ridged eight packer you could wash heavy towels on! A man with his body would be enough; a man with his cock would be enough, add then together and you have a package that is impossible to resist and why would you? To top it off, he's smart and funny and charming and open enough to even let the camera take a long look at the 'no delivery' hole but damn if you are not going to want to get your tongue in there...if you can get you mouth or hole off that stellar dick long enough. Those smooth, tight, swollen eggs test the skin of his nut sack and he spurts endless right on the table and then picks up the glass, now so covered in jizz you can barely see him say good bye...but you'll be much too busy cleaning up your own mess to notice!
title: Magnum Maximus, Scene #01
